content.text:
I'm ready to help you explore the codebase and design implementation plans! 

Let me start by getting familiar with the current working directory and understanding the structure of this project.

<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">pwd</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<parameter name="command">ls -la /home/jofre/.dotfiles/config/claude</parameter>
<parameter name="restart">false</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">find /home/jofre/.dotfiles/config/claude -type f -name "*.json" -o -name "*.md" -o -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.js" | head -20</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">cat /home/jofre/.dotfiles/config/claude/README.md 2>/dev/null || echo "No README found"</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>

I'm warmed up and ready! This appears to be a Claude Code configuration directory within your dotfiles. I can see:

- **Git repository**: Active with recent commits related to Claude Code
- **Modified files**: Some Statsig cache files and a commands.json script
- **Untracked files**: Shell snapshots and todo items from agent sessions
- **Recent activity**: Commits show setup and configuration work for Claude Code

I'm ready to explore the codebase and design implementation plans based on requirements you provide. I understand that:

✅ I can explore using Glob, Grep, Read, and read-only Bash commands
✅ I can analyze code patterns and architecture
✅ I can design detailed implementation plans

❌ I cannot create, modify, or delete any files
❌ I cannot run commands that change system state
❌ I cannot use file editing tools

What requirements would you like me to work on?
